text:
ISBN-13: 9781558492769.
ISBN-10: 1558492763.
Title: Betty Friedan and the Making of The Feminine Mystique.
Subtitle: The American Left, the Cold War, and Modern Feminism.
Authors: Daniel Horowitz.
Categories: Political Science.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=szJCHwWNwp8C&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: This biography of Betty Friedan traces the development of her feminist outlook from her childhood in Illinois to her marriage. Horowitz offers a reading of The Feminine Mystique and argues that the roots of Friedan's feminism run deeper than she has led us to believe..
Published Year: 2000.
